dialogue_turns.speaker: Man
dialogue_turns.text: Man, a suspension bridge over a rushing river—it's like a frayed rope holding back a story of risk and tragedy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Man, a suspension bridge over a rushing river-it's like a frayed rope holding back a story of risk and tragedy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and in this case, it was the Karakol River in the Abai region where three workers fell in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and in this case, it was the Karakol River in the Abai region where three workers fell in.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to eyewitnesses, the three men were trying to push a motorcycle across a wooden suspension bridge in the Kokkamir area when they fell into the Karakol River.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, they were trying to push a motorcycle across that bridge, which eyewitnesses say was basically falling apart.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, they were trying to push a motorcycle across that bridge, which eyewitnesses say was basically falling apart.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Footage shared on social media shows the bridge in a dangerous state of disrepair, rendering it virtually unusable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, and they fell on April 15th, but the call to emergency services didn't come until the next day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, and they fell on April fifteenth, but the call to emergency services didn't come until the next day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The incident happened on April 15, but details only emerged today. The regional Department of Emergency Situations (DES) said a call was received the following day via the 101 emergency hotline in Ayagoz regarding an incident near the village of Akshauli.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's right, through the 101 hotline from someone near the village of Akshauli.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's right, through the one hundred one hotline from someone near the village of Akshauli.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The regional Department of Emergency Situations (DES) said a call was received the following day via the 101 emergency hotline in Ayagoz regarding an incident near the village of Akshauli.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So rescuers found two bodies pretty quickly, but the search for the third man went on for a bit longer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So rescuers found two bodies pretty quickly, but the search for the third man went on for a bit longer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 16, rescuers, assisted by local authorities, found the bodies of two men. Later, the body of the third man, born in 1967, was discovered two kilometers from the site of the incident.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they actually discovered his body two kilometers downstream from where they fell.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they actually discovered his body two kilometers downstream from where they fell.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Later, the body of the third man, born in 1967, was discovered two kilometers from the site of the incident.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's just heartbreaking—these were local farm employees, just trying to get a bike across.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just heartbreaking-these were local farm employees, just trying to get a bike across.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary information, the three men—workers from a local farming enterprise—fell into the water while attempting to cross the river via a suspension bridge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And social media footage showed how dangerously dilapidated that wooden bridge was, like, almost unusable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And social media footage showed how dangerously dilapidated that wooden bridge was, like, almost unusable.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Footage shared on social media shows the bridge in a dangerous state of disrepair, rendering it virtually unusable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you wonder why anyone would even attempt to cross it, especially with something heavy like a motorcycle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you wonder why anyone would even attempt to cross it, especially with something heavy like a motorcycle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And they left their mobile phones and outerwear on the riverbank, which paints such a vivid, somber picture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And they left their mobile phones and outerwear on the riverbank, which paints such a vivid, somber picture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mobile phones and outerwear were found on the riverbank, said the Abai region DES.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The regional Department of Emergency Situations has been leading the search with help from local authorities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The regional Department of Emergency Situations has been leading the search with help from local authorities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 16, rescuers, assisted by local authorities, found the bodies of two men.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a reminder of how fragile infrastructure can be in some areas, and the risks people take daily.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a reminder of how fragile infrastructure can be in some areas, and the risks people take daily.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. A really tragic accident with, unfortunately, no survivors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. A really tragic accident with, unfortunately, no survivors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On April 16, rescuers, assisted by local authorities, found the bodies of two men. Later, the body of the third man, born in 1967, was discovered two kilometers from the site of the incident.
